PersonLifeEvent.name: PersonLifeEvent
PersonLifeEvent.description: Represents the life events of an individual, such as marriage, birth of a child, birthday, engagement.

EventDate.description: The date on which the life event occurred.

EventDescription.description: The description of the life event.

EventLocation.description: The location where the life event occurred.

EventType.description: The type of the life event. For example, birth, graduation, job, marriage, relocation, car, home, baby, retirement.

ExpirationDate.description: The the date when a life event expired.

IsExpired.description: Indicates whether a life event has expired. The default value is False.

IsTentative.description: Indicates that the exact date of the event is not known. The default value is False.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the life event.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PrimaryPersonId.description: ID of the person to whom the life event is related. This field cannot be updated using API.

RelatedPersonId.description: The person related to the primary person in a life event involving two people, such as marriage.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system.
